summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 24th Avenue West, from Thurman Street to Gilman Avenue and from Gilman Place West to Commodore Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in accordance with Resolution No. 14273 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
